name: C&C Red Alert Demastered for NES
name_original: C&C Red Alert Demastered for NES
description:
C&C RedAlert for NES

Controls

Left Mouse Button - accept action (or start button), Right Mouse Button - decline action

Just remember controls from original Red Alert :)

Story

In 1946 the Albert Einstein traveled past in time and deleted the Hitler from history. Germany didn't start a war. But it had side effects...

The Soviet Union started the war and conquered Europe. Only you can stop them!

Made for Retro Jam 2021 https://itch.io/jam/retro-jam-2021
